page.title: 12FOOD (FOSTERS ORIGINAL)
page.content: In Wilbarston there is a distribution factory called Fosters Original Foods. The Foster family moved here over 11 years ago.They chose the Midlands area because of its central location.They do not produce their own products,but re- pack foods with their own label,such as biscuits,cakes,crisps,sweets and whole meal cereals.The business started with Mr Foster and one other person selling biscuits to 10 outlets.It has expanded to 10 employees with a variety of new products.Crisps are very popular. Seasonal cereals sell to 1,200 outlets in East Anglia,Southampton and the Isle of Wight. Today they have 3 lorries, 2 vans and one vintage van for advertising.
